steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Review' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Tracking' group, click on 'Reviewing Pane'.
In the Reviewing Pane, click on 'Show All Revisions Inline'.
Scroll through the document and review all the changes made.
Count the number of characters in the document, including spaces and punctuation marks.
Record the character count in a separate document or note it down for reference.
